remarks: Reflexivity law for line membership.  Part of theorem 6.17 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: linerflx1 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ Q e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P =/= Q ) ) -> P e. ( P Line Q ) ) $.
